etymology.description: Depicts a spindle -> Original form of 專(專) (zhuān, "specialized") and 惠(惠) (huì, "favor")
etymology.interpretation: The character 叀 originally depicted a spindle, which symbolizes the spinning process. This imagery was then borrowed and adapted into the characters 專(專) (zhuān, "specialized") and 惠(惠) (huì, "favor"), but 叀 itself remains as the pictographic representation.
